TextLibrary.Text: Sable
Lydia knew what she was doing. These crystals are exactly to the listed specifications.
Lydia knew what she was doing. These crystals are exactly to the listed specifications. Of course, you did your part as well.
I'm not entirely sure I understand what these are for, but I'll trust they are needed. Do you know what we must do next?
Thanks. What is it you have planned next?
The next part will be messy. One of Nasty Butler's agents equipped the wrong MRI vessel with a necessary component. He seems to think we'll have to destroy the ship and crew all to recover it.
The next part will be messy. One of Nasty Butler's agents equipped the wrong MRI vessel with a necessary component. He seems to think we'll have to destroy the ship and crew all to recover it.
Won't that destroy the component as well?
Wait, so we're supposed to kill an MRI agent just to get this component? Couldn't we just ask for it?
Nasty Butler seems to think the nature of the component is such that it won't be destroyed through conventional weaponry, though I don't know why that is.

Unfortunately, that is the case. The component cannot be uninstalled easily, and the MRI agent isn't likely to give us access to his ship long enough for us to find and remove it. Furthermore, asking about it would reveal this project to the rest of the MRI, which is something I get the feeling we'd be better off without doing.
Perhaps it is composed of unusual materials. In any event, where are we to find this agent?
Ugh. This IS messy. Very well, if you think it is important that we aquire this component, I'll defer to your judgement, Sable.
This agent has been assigned an MRI Blade, much like you have been. We also know he is sent on various patrols in the forward edge of MRI space, the Vega System.
This agent has been assigned an MRI Blade, much like you have been. We also know he is sent on various patrols in the forward edge of MRI space, the Vega System.
How will we find this particular agent out of thousands in the Vega System?
How will we find this particular agent out of thousands in the Vega System?
We've also been given his MRI ID Code. I've asked ED if he could use an observation post in tandem with this ID to locate the ship.
We've also been given his MRI ID Code. I've asked ED if he could use an observation post in tandem with this ID to locate the ship.
And? What did ED say? Can he do it?
Surely ED is capable of this, right?
Well, he muttered something about "Brain the size of a planet, and you want me to find MRI Agents with their ID codes. . ." I think he meant yes.
Well, he muttered something about "Brain the size of a planet, and you want me to find MRI Agents with their ID codes. . ." I think he meant yes.
I think there is an observation post on Vega Station to detect incoming foreign ships. we should be able to use that.
There is an observation post on Vega Station to detect incoming foreign ships. we should be able to use that.
